processingCommand.script:
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:SET &AUTOMIC_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,AUTOMIC_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &COPY_INTEGRATOR# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,COPY_INTEGRATOR,1)
:SET &INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &LOGBACKUP_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,LOGBACKUP_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &ROLLOUT_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,ROLLOUT_SCRIPT_NAME,1)

:PUB &TZ#
:PUB &AUTOMIC_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &COPY_INTEGRATOR#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &LOGBACKUP_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &ROLLOUT_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

:IF &EXTENSIONS# = ""
:  PRINT "ERROR - No extensions selected!"
:  SET &STATUS# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUN_ID#, "ENDED_CANCEL")
:ELSE
:  DEFINE &AEXTENSIONS#, string, 30
:  FILL &AEXTENSIONS#[] = STR_SPLIT("&EXTENSIONS#", ",")
:  PUBLISH &AEXTENSIONS#[],,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:SET &EXTENSIONS_REFS# = ""
:SET &EXTENSIONS_OTHERS# = ""
:SET &EXTENSIONS_STR# = ""
:SET &EXTENSIONS_STR_NL# = ""
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&AEXTENSIONS#[])
:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#])
:  IF  &LENGTH# > 0
:    SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#] , "_")
:    SET &NPOS# = &POS# + 1
:    PRINT &AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#]
:    PRINT &LENGTH#
:    PRINT &NPOS#
!:    SET &EXTENSION# = STR_CUT(&AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#], &NPOS#, &LENGTH#)
:    SET &EXTENSION# = STR_CUT(&AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#], &NPOS#)
:    SET &EXTENSION# = STR_TRIM(&EXTENSION#)

!:check for REFS in name
:  SET &ISREFS# = STR_FIND(&EXTENSION#,"REFS")
:IF &ISREFS# = 0
:  SET &EXTENSIONS_OTHERS# = STR_CAT(&EXTENSIONS_OTHERS#, "&AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#],")
:ELSE
:  SET &EXTENSIONS_REFS# = STR_CAT(&EXTENSIONS_REFS#, "&AEXTENSIONS#[&RUNVAR#],")
:ENDIF
!:check for REFS in name

:    SET &EXTENSIONS_STR# = STR_CAT(&EXTENSIONS_STR#, "&EXTENSION#,")
:    SET &EXTENSIONS_STR_NL# = STR_CAT(&EXTENSIONS_STR_NL#, &EXTENSION#)
:    SET &EXTENSIONS_STR_NL# = STR_CAT(&EXTENSIONS_STR_NL#, "\n")
:  ENDIF
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&EXTENSIONS_STR#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &EXTENSIONS_STR# = SUBSTR(&EXTENSIONS_STR#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &EXTENSIONS_STR#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EXTENSIONS_STR_NL#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&EXTENSIONS_OTHERS#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &EXTENSIONS_OTHERS# = SUBSTR(&EXTENSIONS_OTHERS#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&EXTENSIONS_REFS#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &EXTENSIONS_REFS# = SUBSTR(&EXTENSIONS_REFS#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &EXTENSIONS_REFS#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EXTENSIONS_OTHERS#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &REST_MODULES# = "WMS,REFS,RW,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = "WMS,REFS,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES_DB#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &INSTALL_EXTENSION_STATUS# = "true"
:PUBLISH &INSTALL_EXTENSION_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

! Restart type
:SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER", 1)
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

! Mbuild message
:IF &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = ""
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "without mbuild"
:ELSE
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "with mbuild"
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID# = ""
:PUBLISH &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID#,,WORKFLOW

! RPTAB check
:SET &CHECK_RPTAB# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CHECK_RPTAB", 1)
:PUBLISH &CHECK_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "True"

! STRY0029851 - configuration item is not defined value then it is nonproduction and will be assigned LATAM L2
:IF &CONFIGURATION_ITEM# <> GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "TEST_NOT_CONFIGURATION_ITEM", 1)
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:  SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "False"
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN#
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
